aiResponse: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) was formalized by Douglas Crockford in the early 2000s. He based the format on a subset of the Python programming language's dictionary syntax.

aiResponse: The Braille system of reading and writing for visually impaired people was developed by Louis Braille in 1824, when he was just 15 years old.
